review: A+ for quad core, bluetooth controller powered gaming ( i use the moga pro)only drawbacks are the lack of headphone jack in remote (roku2/3 feature) and unintuitive User Interface (this is obviously subject to change with software updates)Ultimately, this is my preferred device over Roku 2 (which I also own), because this has sooooo much more content, the option for more legitimately fun gaming (a lot of it is free content) and just elite hardware. Definitely recommend

review: Works amazing, unless you watch Hulu Plus.  Do not get this if you want to watch Hulu Plus until they fix the black screen issue.  About every 3rd episode after the ads you'll get a black screen but you'll still hear audio.  You have to exit the app and clear the cache for the app in settings.  Then when you go back to watch the episode again it starts you from the beginning and you get to watch the wonderful Hulu Plus ads all over again.-UPDATEDied on me after 2 months.  Worked last night, went to turn it on today, doesn't work.  At this point would not recommend.  Wait until a new version of it comes out.
